programme.desc: Start your day with Audie Cornish bringing you the latest headlines and analysis.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: Stay up to date with John Berman, Kate Bolduan and Sara Sidner from CNN's immersive news hub.

programme.title: World Sport

programme.title: World Sport

programme.desc: Becky Anderson explores diverse perspectives and explains global issues of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight With Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: We've seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambia‚Äôs Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. She‚Äôs just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, it‚Äôs a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal while the Marsh Pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the Northern Pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests and hills. Once a great pride, their sons have been banished, and if they can't rebuild their pride they face hunger, exile or worse..

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Frogs may just be the key to human immortality while the cat's purrs may help keep astronauts alive in space..

programme.title: Zombie Animals
programme.desc: When it comes to survival, sometimes taking over another animal is the only way to get a step ahead. Naturalist Dan ONeil investigates the weird and wonderful world of mutant animals, mind controlling fungus, and a fish that transforms itself into a set of testes. .

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: June must deal with orphaned pup, Vince, as he tries to join her burrow. Over in the Highlands, Scarlett's fearless pups go in search of two badgers, a choice with deadly consequences.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: The Prairie Dogs of northern New Mexico deal with all kinds of threats, big and small. In the Flatlands, June faces an infestation of fleas.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Rivalry defines all life in the forests of the Iberian Peninsula. The arrival of summer marks the beginning of what will be a prolonged period of drought in the region, making survival even more difficult for the animals who call this place home. Every creature must fight for limited resources ‚Äì making competition both within and between species unavoidable.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go! In the wilds of Southern Africa, the long, dry winter brings a desperation to the animals who live here. Prepare yourself for a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses break all the rules on animal intelligence. Born into the world as orphans, they are self-taught masterminds; capable of solving complex problems, strategizing, even planning for the future. Extraordinary superpowers that are the secret to their success.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses were always thought to be natures ultimate loners, preferring their own company. The truth is they have secret social lives. From moms to be hanging out in the deep in their hundreds to an octopus capable of coworking with another species. These aliens of nature are more sociable than ever imagined.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: The forests of the Iberian Peninsula in Europe‚Äôs southwest corner are home to some of the most unusual animals on Earth. Every species must fight to survive in these savage lands, but the spring rains are one of the greatest gifts of the year. In this brief window of time, animals seek out the precise breeding conditions that will give their species the best chance of surviving another generation.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol searches for clues to why a python has lumps under her skin. Dr. Nicole discovers the surprising cause of a cat‚Äôs sky-high fever, and Dr. Lisa sutures a dog‚Äôs puncture wound. In the parking lot, alpacas get their shots and a goose gets loose. Dr. Pol is asked by a local baseball team to throw out the first pitch. To warm up his arm, Dr. Pol plays catch with Charles and Abigail.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: With an ultrasound for a bearded dragon and wound care for a goose, the to-do list never ends. Dr. Lisa has back-to-back pup emergencies. Dr. Pol and Dr. Brenda team up to answer an emergency farm call, and Dr. Nicole gives TLC to a stray kitty. While the clinic staff takes care of business in MI, Dr. Pol proudly escorts U.S. veterans to Washington, D.C. with the Mid-Michigan Honor Flight.

programme.desc: Wolves are a supreme example of cooperative hunting, their efficiency based on hierarchy within a pack that demands loyalty..
